page.title: 03Guidepost Jazzband.
page.content: Go to the Guidepost Grenadiers Juvenile Jazzband.It is on two nights of the week which are a Monday from 6-8 pm at the Guidepost Community Centre and a Wednesday from 6-7:30 pm at the Guidepost Middle School training shed. The Jazzband is ran by four people who train the ranks,(people on the kazoo) and who train the the drum section. There are around 30 people in the Jazzband. In the drum section there are a bass drum,tanner drums,side drums and a kabasa.In the ranks there are kazoos. There is a banner and a mascot and two majors on the mace. We go away every Saturday,sometimes on a Sunday,to Newcastle,Durham or Sunderland.
